import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import * as S from './styles/HomeStyles' const Home = () => { /* const [heros, setHeros] = useState([]) */ const [heroi, setHeroi] = useState([]) const [id, setId] = useState() const [fullName, setFullName] = useState() async function fetchData(search) { let response = await axios(`https://www.superheroapi.com/api.php/3992681667526682/search/${search}`) await setHeroi(response.data.results) //await console.log(`Search - ${search} -- Response - ${heroi}`) } const handleHeroi = (e) => { fetchData(e.target.value) } const handleBotao = () => { console.log(heroi) } return( <>

Heros

{heroi ? heroi.map((hero) => <>

  • id: {hero.id} - Nome: {hero.name}

  • Powerstats

    • Intelligence = {hero.powerstats.intelligence}
    • Strength = {hero.powerstats.strength}
    • Speed = {hero.powerstats.speed}
    • Durability = {hero.powerstats.durability}
    • Combat = {hero.powerstats.combat}

  • Biography

    • Full-Name = {`hero.biography.full-name`}
    • Alter-egos = {hero.biography.alter_egos}
 ) : ''} ) } export default Home
